name: InsightsTab
functionalRequirements:
## Insights Tab

### Purpose
Provides analytical insights and recommendations.

### Features
- AI-generated insights
- Trend analysis
- Recommendations
- Performance metrics
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- insights: Array of insight items
- metrics: Performance metrics
- onInsightAction: Action handler for insights

properties.name: insights
properties.type: Array<{id: string, title: string, description: string, category: string, trend: 'up' | 'down' | 'stable', impactScore: number}>
